entry.string: There are currently no comments in the database...
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a coorrently nu cumments in zee detebese-a...

entry.string: By clicking on Delete you can delete all comments associated with a particular module. Clicking on a module will take you to that module's statistics page containing the figures for each of that module's items that have comments associated with them. From there you can delete all comments associated with a particular item.
entry.translation: By cleecking oon Delete-a yuoo cun delete-a ell cumments essuceeeted veet a perteecooler mudoole-a. Cleecking oon a mudoole-a veell teke-a yuoo tu thet mudoole's steteestics pege-a cunteeening zee feegoores fur iech ooff thet mudoole's items thet hefe-a cumments essuceeeted veet zeem. Frum zeere-a yuoo cun delete-a ell cumments essuceeeted veet a perteecooler item.
